::Composer/Surgital/Orchestra::

     Composer jumps to the side and is hit=
 in the leg by one of the lasers, and the other one hits him in the leg as =
well.  Some mech fluid sprays out.

      "Aggh!!  Why I oughtta!" Composer=
 yells.

     Composer got up, then began strafing to the side and firing 2=
 plasma shots up at Autofire while running.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Surgital tilts his head over to avoid the one lightning =
bolt, but it skims his neck and gives him a jolt.  And then, he is struck r=
ight in the chest by another lightning bolt.  He stumbled back, but this ti=
me he was careful not to fall.

       "Now that my little Decepticon frien=
d is out of the way, we fight without distraction!" Surgital said, watching=
 Tantrum go help FireBlade and stuff.

       Surgital cackled, then threw =
a sideways punch at Lavatron's head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~
      "Yes, I've finished the task you assigned me," Orchestra replie=
d to Darkfate.
